metadata.title: CVE-2020-10809 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in HDF5 through 1.12.0. A heap-based bufferoverflow exists in the function Decompress() located in decompress.c. Itcan be triggered by sending a crafted file to the gif2h5 binary. It allowsan attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
